title: The exhaust nerf is probaly one of the stupidest nerfs you guys have done in awhile
body: With how damage heavy this game is right now you nerf one of the main defenses against power creep for no reason at all.  its a ridiculously stupid change. anyone that builds atk speed just laughs at it now.  If you wanted to nerf it then hitting its CD or nerfing its atk speed reduction at early levels and letting it scale would be much better alternatives. now its just a anti burst summoner skill.

replies.body: No it wasn't it was hilariously overloaded for so long and totally deserved everything it got.

we can at least agree that Exhaust needed some sort of nerf though right? The thing was being used as an *offensive* spell in a lot of cases because of the resistance reductions and movement speed reductions

It needed a nerf, but I feel like they tackled it too hard

ya, it would be better to nerf its CD OR nerf the atk speed reduction at early levels and let it scale. getting rid of it entirely was a horrible move.

It's a pretty un-interactive summoner spell that punishes you for making aggressive plays. 

I take this summoner spell mid or top when they have a diver/assassin so I can just point and click on the enemy and make them useless for an important part of a teampart. It doesn't take much skill to use it.

I don't think this summoner spell is healthy whatsoever.

NONE of the summoner spells are healthy and all of them need massive overhauls, but that is besides the point. the point is exhaust was a skill used to keep hyper melee carries in check. after its SEVERE nerf there will be no real checks for champions that scale hard off of atk speed and crit.

like i said, if they really wanted to nerf it then increasing its CD would be alot better than making the skill virtually useless against anyone that isnt a burst assassin/mage, and even then its really not that effective even against them.

It still reduces their damage by 40%. 

Their Qs are a good chuck of their  damage, that gets reduced. 

If we did a test, we could see the % of damage that was reduced just from the attack speed change alone. 

For the attack speed, it kinda depends at what point of the game it is. It'd be stronger early since its going to reduce a large portion of their attack speed.

Late game it didn't do much anyways. It reduced attack speed by 30%, thats not even {{item:1042}} {{item:1042}} {{item:1042}} 900 gold

40% reduced damage is an absurd number. {{summoner:3}} is still a brain dead amazing summoner spell.

except melee adcs who build atkspeed wont give a shit because exhaust doesnt reduce atk speed anymore, and there dmg doesnt come from burst. it usually comes from onhit/true dmg so the 40% dmg reduction wont do barely anything to it

A melee carry needs to do significant damage in the very small windows they get to stick onto someone in order to be relevant with all the peels, zhonias, escapes, and everything else they have to deal with. To have their damage nuetred for 2.5 seconds right when they get into range makes them do almost nothing and then the slow just serves as an added distance they have to close again, only by this point they will be lucky to immediately run and survive.

It's especially bad for people like riven, khazix, wukong, etc. who get at least half of their damage from up front burst on their abilities and can't really survive long if their initiation gets cockblocked by exhaust.

It's pretty stupid but not for these reasons. I loved exhaust for turning tanks into butter but now it's just pidgeonholing the spell to only be used on assassins. Riot has their own poor view on how this game should be played and they slowly shape this game into that vision with every patch and then pretend they don't support the meta game.
